response_parsed.title: Refactoring Notebooks to Production Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to convert Jupyter notebooks into production-ready APIs using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
key_points: Understand the advantages of refactoring notebooks to production-ready APIs
Install required packages: FastAPI, Uvicorn, and pandas
Convert a Jupyter notebook into a Python script
Structure the code using FastAPI's routing system
Implement API endpoints for data ingestion and output
Deploy the application using Uvicorn as an ASGI server
Test the API locally and in production
version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for using FastAPI
caveats: Ensure proper data validation, input sanitization, and error handling in API endpoints
Consider using a database to store data instead of relying on CSV files in notebooks
Use environment variables for configuring API keys and secrets
